channel.title: Nutrition & Diet on
channel.description: Recent content in Nutrition & Diet on

item.title: Lemak dan Kesehatan
item.description: Lipida atau lemak sering kali mendapatkan konotasi yang buruk di masyarakat, membuat gemuk, menyebabkan penyakit dan sebagainya. Padahal lemak adalah zat gizi essensial yang penting bagi tubuh. Lemak terdapat pada banyak bahan makanan, meskipun terdapat variasi jumlah, jenis dan kualitasnya. Untuk mendapatkan kesehatan yang optimal kita perlu mengenal kebutuhan lemak, jenis lemak yang baik serta jumlah yang sesuai. Beberapa lemak diketahui memiliki manfaat kesehatan dan dapat melindungi dari penyakit tidak menular seperti penyakit jantung dan stroke.

item.title: Eating Healthy – Explode Your Physical & Mental Health
item.description: In this online healthy diet course you will learn discover the many benefits of simply making better diet choices. Doing this can transform your body & mind. Using these secrets can add many healthy years to your life, help you be more productive and prevent illnesses. Many find that existing conditions also improve or go way completely … Once they have a proper diet full of life giving nutrients. This online course will give you hidden diet & nutrition secrets such as: 1) How healthy eating can be made simple & easy 2) How your pH level affects your health … and the foods to eat or avoid to fix this level 3) Learn about “good & “bad” fats 4) Discover how to cook simple healthy meals fast 5) Discover easy tricks to maintain your healthy eating & prevent “backsliding” 6) .

item.title: The Secrets To Burning Fat – How To Melt Fat Away!
item.description: In this online fat burning course you will learn how burn fat the way the top pros teach it. Consider this course to be your training pro guiding you to the most effective methods for fat burning & a healthy lifestyle. We are NOT giving medical advice … but this course contains tips, tools & strategies based on sound principles & scientific research. This course will give you the hidden fat burning secrets of the following areas: 1) Healthy eating 2) The proper way to exercise and 3) The use of supplements.

item.title: Dieting - Nutrition -Weight Loss Tips for Good Healthy Life
item.description: Dieting - Nutrition -Weight Loss Tips for Good Healthy LifeDieting for Weight Loss - Solid Nutrition - Fitness and a Healthy Life - Building a Diet that Works for You - Forever! Are you tired of dieting and never seeing any long-term results? Have you already tried the Atkins Diet, the South Beach Diet, the Paleo Diet, Milkshake Diet, the Twinkie Diet, and all the others and they didn’t work?

item.title: Weight loss Certification Diploma: weight loss crash course
item.description: This course is designed for anyone who wants to lose fat, be healthy, and feel great. My Weight Loss & Nutrition Course is not some random fad diet that tells you which foods you should and shouldn't eat. Instead, I will take you through each of the steps involved in setting up and following through with your diet. Unfortunately, the internet is full of false health gurus that sell you all kinds of diet plans and supplements that are overpriced and don't work.

item.title: Nutrition Summary: 3 Weight Loss Methods for Becoming Slim
item.description: If you ever imagined that one day you would change your life, behave different, feel different, like it isn’t you anymore – here’s your chance. I’m sure if you follow those 3 weight loss methods, you won’t feel the same anymore. You will feel better than ever and your body is going to thank you in advance. Developing a healthy eating habit is hard, but it pays off way too much.
